name: Zara Sandouk
about: Zara Sandouk is an Executive Recruitment Consultant at Seven Executive Limited…
recommendations: Joseph Cavallaro “I cannot recommend Zara and her Team enough. During my recent search as well as in the past; I have never experienced the level of follow through and professionalism that Zara exhibited throughout the entire process. She was fully engaged in my situation and never failed to respond. If she reaches out to you or if you are searching for your next opportunity; don't hesitate to reach out to her.”

volunteer_experience.info: We worked with a charity who's main focus was helping disabled children learn to ride horses. We planned a project to make the stable and grounds more wheelchair accessible for the children and fundraised collectively to achieve this goal.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: NCS - National Citizen Service Trust
volunteer_experience.title: Student Fundraiser
